==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
In Japanese {{w|kanji}} and Korean {{w|hanja}}, the {{l|mul|丷}} component of {{l|mul|益}} is inverted to become {{l|mul|八}}, which is the historical form found in the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}.
